verses.verse: וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> now these תּוֹלְדֹ֥ת <WH8435> These also [are] the generations אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> of Aaron וּמֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> and Moses בְּי֗וֹם <WH3117> in the day דִּבֶּ֧ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> [that] the LORD אֶת־ <WH854> with מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> with Moses בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> in mount סִינָֽי׃ <WH5514> Sinai

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> These שְׁמ֥וֹת <WH8034> And these [are] the names בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> of the sons אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> of Aaron הַבְּכ֣וֹר ׀ <WH1060> the firstborn נָדָ֑ב <WH5070> Nadab וַאֲבִיה֕וּא <WH30> and Abihu אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <WH499> Eleazar וְאִיתָמָֽר׃ <WH385> and Ithamar

אֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> These שְׁמוֹת֙ <WH8034> These [are] the names בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> of Aaron הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> the priests הַמְּשֻׁחִ֑ים <WH4886> which were anointed אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom מִלֵּ֥א <WH4390> accomplish יָדָ֖ם <WH3027> able לְכַהֵֽן׃ <WH3547> to minister in the priest's office

וַיָּ֣מָת <WH4191> died נָדָ֣ב <WH5070> And Nadab וַאֲבִיה֣וּא <WH30> and Abihu לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּֽהַקְרִבָם֩ <WH7126> when they offered אֵ֨שׁ <WH784> fire זָרָ֜ה <WH2114> strange לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> before יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD בְּמִדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> in the wilderness סִינַ֔י <WH5514> of Sinai וּבָנִ֖ים <WH1121> and they had no children לֹא־ <WH3808> no הָי֣וּ <WH1961> had לָהֶ֑ם וַיְכַהֵ֤ן <WH3547> ministered in the priest's office אֶלְעָזָר֙ <WH499> and Eleazar וְאִ֣יתָמָ֔ר <WH385> and Ithamar עַל־ <WH5921> in פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> in the sight אַהֲרֹ֥ן <WH175> of Aaron אֲבִיהֶֽם׃ <WH1> their father פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

הַקְרֵב֙ <WH7126> near אֶת־ <WH853> מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> the tribe לֵוִ֔י <WH3881> Leviite וְֽהַעֲמַדְתָּ֣ <WH5975> and present אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> them before אַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> the priest וְשֵׁרְת֖וּ <WH8334> that they may minister אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וְשָׁמְר֣וּ <WH8104> And they shall keep אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁמַרְתּ֗וֹ <WH4931> his charge וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁמֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH4931> and the charge כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> of the whole congregation לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation לַעֲבֹ֖ד <WH5647> to do אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבֹדַ֥ת <WH5656> the service הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> of the tabernacle

וְשָׁמְר֗וּ <WH8104> And they shall keep אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all כְּלֵי֙ <WH3627> all the instruments אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת <WH4931> and the charge בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel לַעֲבֹ֖ד <WH5647> to do אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבֹדַ֥ת <WH5656> the service הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> of the tabernacle

וְנָתַתָּה֙ <WH5414> And thou shalt give אֶת־ <WH853> הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> the Levites לְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> unto Aaron וּלְבָנָ֑יו <WH1121> and to his sons נְתוּנִ֨ם <WH5414> they [are] wholly given נְתוּנִ֥ם <WH5414> given הֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> like ל֔וֹ מֵאֵ֖ת <WH854> among בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto him out of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַהֲרֹ֤ן <WH175> Aaron וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָיו֙ <WH1121> and his sons תִּפְקֹ֔ד <WH6485> And thou shalt appoint וְשָׁמְר֖וּ <WH8104> and they shall wait on אֶת־ <WH853> כְּהֻנָּתָ֑ם <WH3550> their priest's office וְהַזָּ֥ר <WH2114> and the stranger הַקָּרֵ֖ב <WH7126> approach יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> shall be put to death פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

וַאֲנִ֞י <WH589> I הִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> now behold לָקַ֣חְתִּי <WH3947> And I behold I have taken אֶת־ <WH853> הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> the Levites מִתּוֹךְ֙ <WH8432> from among בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel תַּ֧חַת <WH8478> instead כָּל־ <WH3605> of every בְּכ֛וֹר <WH1060> instead of all the firstborn פֶּ֥טֶר <WH6363> that openeth רֶ֖חֶם <WH7358> the matrix מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> among the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְהָ֥יוּ <WH1961> become לִ֖י הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> therefore the Levites

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לִי֮ כָּל־ <WH3605> for all בְּכוֹר֒ <WH1060> Because all the firstborn בְּיוֹם֩ <WH3117> [are] mine [for] on the day הַכֹּתִ֨י <WH5221> that I smote כָל־ <WH3605> all בְּכ֜וֹר <WH1060> all the firstborn בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> of Egypt הִקְדַּ֨שְׁתִּי <WH6942> I hallowed לִ֤י כָל־ <WH3605> all בְּכוֹר֙ <WH1060> unto me all the firstborn בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> in Israel מֵאָדָ֖ם <WH120> both man עַד־ <WH5704> against בְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> and beast לִ֥י יִהְי֖וּ <WH1961> become אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> mine shall they be I [am] the LORD ס
וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> in the wilderness סִינַ֖י <WH5514> of Sinai לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

פְּקֹד֙ <WH6485> Number אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children לֵוִ֔י <WH3881> Leviite לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> after the house אֲבֹתָ֖ם <WH1> of their fathers לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> by their families כָּל־ <WH3605> every זָכָ֛ר <WH2145> every male מִבֶּן־ <WH1121> old חֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> from a month וָמַ֖עְלָה <WH4605> and upward תִּפְקְדֵֽם׃ <WH6485> shalt thou number

וַיִּפְקֹ֥ד <WH6485> numbered אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> And Moses עַל־ <WH5921> according פִּ֣י <WH6310> them according to the word יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> he צֻוָּֽה׃ <WH6680> as he was commanded

וַיִּֽהְיוּ־ <WH1961> become אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> These בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And these were the sons לֵוִ֖י <WH3881> Leviite בִּשְׁמֹתָ֑ם <WH8034> by their names גֵּרְשׁ֕וֹן <WH1648> Gershon וּקְהָ֖ת <WH6955> and Kohath וּמְרָרִֽי׃ <WH4847> and Merari

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> These שְׁמ֥וֹת <WH8034> And these [are] the names בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> of the sons גֵרְשׁ֖וֹן <WH1648> of Gershon לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> by their families לִבְנִ֖י <WH3845> Libni וְשִׁמְעִֽי׃ <WH8096> and Shimei

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> And the sons קְהָ֖ת <WH6955> of Kohath לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> by their families עַמְרָ֣ם <WH6019> Amram וְיִצְהָ֔ר <WH3324> and Izehar חֶבְר֖וֹן <WH2275> Hebron וְעֻזִּיאֵֽל׃ <WH5816> and Uzziel

וּבְנֵ֧י <WH1121> And the sons מְרָרִ֛י <WH4847> of Merari לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> by their families מַחְלִ֣י <WH4249> Mahli וּמוּשִׁ֑י <WH4187> and Mushi אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> These הֵ֛ם <WH1992> These [are] מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> the families הַלֵּוִ֖י <WH3881> of the Levites לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> according to the house אֲבֹתָֽם׃ <WH1> of their fathers

לְגֵ֣רְשׁ֔וֹן <WH1648> Of Gershon מִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <WH4940> [was] the family הַלִּבְנִ֔י <WH3846> of the Libnites וּמִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> and the family הַשִּׁמְעִ֑י <WH8097> of the Shimites אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> these הֵ֔ם <WH1992> like מִשְׁפְּחֹ֖ת <WH4940> these [are] the families הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּֽי׃ <WH1649> of the Gershonites

פְּקֻדֵיהֶם֙ <WH6485> Those that were numbered בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> of them according to the number כָּל־ <WH3605> of all זָכָ֔ר <WH2145> of all the males מִבֶּן־ <WH1121> old חֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> from a month וָמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> and upward פְּקֻ֣דֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6485> [even] those that were numbered שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> of them [were] seven אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <WH3967> hundred
מִשְׁפְּחֹ֖ת <WH4940> The families הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּ֑י <WH1649> of the Gershonites אַחֲרֵ֧י <WH310> behind הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <WH4908> the tabernacle יַחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> shall pitch יָֽמָּה׃ <WH3220> westward

וּנְשִׂ֥יא <WH5387> And the chief בֵֽית־ <WH1004> of the house אָ֖ב <WH1> of the father לַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּ֑י <WH1649> of the Gershonites אֶלְיָסָ֖ף <WH460> [shall be] Eliasaph בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son לָאֵֽל׃ <WH3815> of Lael

וּמִשְׁמֶ֤רֶת <WH4931> And the charge בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the sons גֵרְשׁוֹן֙ <WH1648> of Gershon בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> [shall be] the tabernacle וְהָאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> and the tent מִכְסֵ֕הוּ <WH4372> the covering וּמָסַ֕ךְ <WH4539> thereof and the hanging פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> for the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וְקַלְעֵ֣י <WH7050> And the hangings הֶֽחָצֵ֗ר <WH2691> of the court וְאֶת־ <WH853> מָסַךְ֙ <WH4539> and the curtain פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> for the door הֶֽחָצֵ֔ר <WH2691> of the court אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> and הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <WH4908> which [is] by the tabernacle וְעַל־ <WH5921> and הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> and by the altar סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> round about וְאֵת֙ <WH853> מֵֽיתָרָ֔יו <WH4340> and the cords לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all עֲבֹדָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5656> of it for all the service

וְלִקְהָ֗ת <WH6955> And of Kohath מִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <WH4940> [was] the family הַֽעַמְרָמִי֙ <WH6020> of the Amramites וּמִשְׁפַּ֣חַת <WH4940> and the family הַיִּצְהָרִ֔י <WH3325> of the Izeharites וּמִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <WH4940> and the family הַֽחֶבְרֹנִ֔י <WH2276> of the Hebronites וּמִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> and the family הָֽעָזִּיאֵלִ֑י <WH5817> of the Uzzielites אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> these הֵ֖ם <WH1992> like מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> these [are] the families הַקְּהָתִֽי׃ <WH6956> of the Kohathites

בְּמִסְפַּר֙ <WH4557> In the number כָּל־ <WH3605> of all זָכָ֔ר <WH2145> of all the males מִבֶּן־ <WH1121> old חֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> from a month וָמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> and upward שְׁמֹנַ֤ת <WH8083> [were] eight אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> thousand וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> and six מֵא֔וֹת <WH3967> hundred שֹׁמְרֵ֖י <WH8104> keeping מִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <WH4931> the charge הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> of the sanctuary

מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> The families בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the sons קְהָ֖ת <WH6955> of Kohath יַחֲנ֑וּ <WH2583> shall pitch עַ֛ל <WH5921> and יֶ֥רֶךְ <WH3409> on the side הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle תֵּימָֽנָה׃ <WH8486> southward

וּנְשִׂ֥יא <WH5387> And the chief בֵֽית־ <WH1004> of the house אָ֖ב <WH1> of the father לְמִשְׁפְּחֹ֣ת <WH4940> of the families הַקְּהָתִ֑י <WH6956> of the Kohathites אֶלִיצָפָ֖ן <WH469> [shall be] Elizaphan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֻזִּיאֵֽל׃ <WH5816> of Uzziel

וּמִשְׁמַרְתָּ֗ם <WH4931> And their charge הָאָרֹ֤ן <WH727> [shall be] the ark וְהַשֻּׁלְחָן֙ <WH7979> and the table וְהַמְּנֹרָ֣ה <WH4501> and the candlestick וְהַֽמִּזְבְּחֹ֔ת <WH4196> and the altars וּכְלֵ֣י <WH3627> and the vessels הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יְשָׁרְת֖וּ <WH8334> wherewith they minister בָּהֶ֑ם וְהַ֨מָּסָ֔ךְ <WH4539> and the hanging וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and all עֲבֹדָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5656> and all the service

וּנְשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> [shall be] chief נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <WH5387> over the chief הַלֵּוִ֔י <WH3881> of the Levites אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <WH499> And Eleazar בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> the priest פְּקֻדַּ֕ת <WH6486> [and have] the oversight שֹׁמְרֵ֖י <WH8104> of them that keep מִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <WH4931> the charge הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> of the sanctuary

לִמְרָרִ֕י <WH4847> Of Merari מִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <WH4940> [was] the family הַמַּחְלִ֔י <WH4250> of the Mahlites וּמִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <WH4940> and the family הַמּוּשִׁ֑י <WH4188> of the Mushites אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> these הֵ֖ם <WH1992> like מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> these [are] the families מְרָרִֽי׃ <WH4847> of Merari

וּפְקֻדֵיהֶם֙ <WH6485> And those that were numbered בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> of them according to the number כָּל־ <WH3605> of all זָכָ֔ר <WH2145> of all the males מִבֶּן־ <WH1121> old חֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> from a month וָמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> and upward שֵׁ֥שֶׁת <WH8337> [were] six אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> thousand וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <WH3967> and two hundred
